content.text:
# Ministry of Agriculture (Croatia)

"...(on day 19. February 2015)."
| budget          = HRK 6.387 billion (2015)
| jurisdiction    = Government of Croatia
| minister1_name  = David Vlajčić

The ministry of Agriculture () is a ministry of the Croatian government, whose work is aimed at overseeing the development of agriculture and fisheries in Croatia.
, the Neretva Delta in Dalmatia makes a major contribution in some sectors.]]
